text: yeung minban banhchoun anakneasar na mneak laey leukleng te daembi aoy mnoussa bratebatte tam ke daoy mean karoanounhnhat pi a l laoh bonnaoh . chea karpit nasa brasenbae nowpel del puok ke ban bampean leu khluoneng ban mk rk anak( mou ham meat) haey ban som aphytosa pi a l laoh haey anakneasar ka chuoy som aphytosa aoy puokke der noh puokke pitchea nung bankheunh tha a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
